title: Beautiful, Completely Remodel-Huge Flat-W/d In-Unit-Parking
posting_body: Tucked into a quiet corner on the north side of Pacific Heights, this fabulous 1970s flat brims with all the modern luxuries you need to thrive in 2022 in an oasis of calm and comfort.
Inside you're greeted with beautiful wood flooring and a generous helping afternoon natural light that pours in through the windows that anchor the open plan living/dining/kitchen room.

The completely remodeled chef’s kitchen is stacked with life-enhancing amenities including stainless steel appliances, and a large island that separates the galley kitchen with seating for 4 - perfect for an easy evening supper or a full on bacchanale.
The thoughtful layout includes three large bedrooms on opposite sides of the entry hall that lend some additional privacy - one with en-suite bath, one of 2.5 baths in the flat.
Each bedroom has a large closet space with mirrored doors and can accommodate a king sized bed.
In addition to the second full bath, there is a half bath off the hallway with a washer and dryer.
Completely remodeled and offering 1600+ square feet of living space, additional perks & amenities include:
--Brand new state of the art kitchen with stainless steel appliances including gas range, dishwasher and over-sized refrigerator, tiled backsplash and freestanding storage cabinet in
--Two and half remodeled bathrooms both tiled with lovely vanity and storage
Garage parking is available for an additional $300/month.
Pacific Heights is many things to many people but to almost all San Franciscans, it is one of the most scenic neighborhoods in the city.
1885 Pacific Street is ideally situated - a short walk to Fillmore Street and everything you can imagine on offer.

Going in the opposite direction, it’s  a few blocks above the treasure trove of local boutiques, shops, restaurants and watering holes along Union Street and a stroll down to Polk Street where you’ll find some of the best culinary shopping in the city.
To top things off, you're 5 minutes from Lafayette Park and its 11+ acres of palm trees, dogs and some of the best views in the city.
WALK SCORE: 98 / TRANSIT SCORE: 84 / BIKE SCORE: 60
